{ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bronze Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in bronze.".getBytes(); } [/quote]

item.title: [Delta] [317] Re-Colouring Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

if(i == 8014)    //WH1P!!!!
        {
            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want
            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
        class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];

item.title: [Delta] [317] Re-Colouring Help
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Hey, so I just started to mess around with re-colouring items for my server. The only problem I am having is with the items that do not provide their

class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = ###; class8.anIntArray160[0] = ###;

For example: I have been trying to re-colour the abyssal whip but it does not provide the class8.anIntArray156 or class8.anIntArray160. So if someone could please tell me how to do this that would be great!

Abyssal whip:

if(i == 4151) //ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.aString170 = "Abyssal whip"; //Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Your Description Here".getBytes(); //Description class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

Read full topic
